Episodes.Title: The Electric Can Opener Fluctuation
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steven Molaro
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: After returning from the North Pole, a conflict among the guys sends Sheldon back to Texas and interferes with Leonard's reunion with Penny.

Episodes.Title: The Jiminy Conjecture
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Jim Reynolds
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Leonard and Penny's first night together goes awkwardly. Sheldon and Howard wager on the species of a cricket.

Episodes.Title: The Gothowitz Deviation
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Maria Ferrari
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon attempts to covertly alter Penny's habits, while Howard and Raj try their luck meeting women at a Goth-style club.

Episodes.Title: The Pirate Solution
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steve Holland
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: When Raj has to find a new job or be sent back to India, Sheldon's solution leaves Leonard and Penny dealing with Howard as the third wheel.

Episodes.Title: The Creepy Candy Coating Corollary
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Lee Aronsohn
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Leonard is forced to ask Penny to set Howard up with one of her friends, while Sheldon seeks payback against sci-fi star Wil Wheaton.

Episodes.Title: The Cornhusker Vortex
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, David Goetsch
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Leonard tries to learn about football to fit in with Penny's friends. Meanwhile, a loss in a kite war threatens to end Raj and Howard's friendship.

Episodes.Title: The Guitarist Amplification
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Richard Rosenstock
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon is caught in the middle when Leonard and Penny argue about Penny's friend staying at her apartment.

Episodes.Title: The Adhesive Duck Deficiency
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steven Molaro
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Penny is forced to turn to Sheldon for help when she dislocates her shoulder in the bathtub. Meanwhile, the rest of the guys accidentally get stoned in the desert while waiting for a meteor shower.

Episodes.Title: The Vengeance Formulation
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Richard Rosenstock
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon plans revenge after Kripke humiliates him on the radio. Howard develops doubts about his relationship with Bernadette.

Episodes.Title: The Gorilla Experiment
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steven Molaro
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon attempts to help Penny understand physics to impress Leonard, while Howard becomes jealous when Bernadette takes an interest in Leonard's research.

Episodes.Title: The Maternal Congruence
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, David Goetsch
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Leonard's mother makes a visit to his dismay and Sheldon's delight.

Episodes.Title: The Psychic Vortex
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Eric Kaplan
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Raj talks Sheldon into being his wingman at a university mixer. Leonard has trouble dealing with Penny consulting a psychic.

Episodes.Title: The Bozeman Reaction
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steven Molaro
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: When their apartment is robbed, Leonard and Sheldon turn to Howard and Raj to create a state-of-the-art security system.

Episodes.Title: The Einstein Approximation
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steven Molaro
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon wreaks havoc when he is stumped by a difficult physics question.

Episodes.Title: The Large Hadron Collision
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Lee Aronsohn
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: When Leonard is offered a trip to Switzerland on Valentine's Day to visit the CERN laboratory, Sheldon uses any and all means to be his guest instead of Penny.

Episodes.Title: The Excelsior Acquisition
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steve Holland
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon misses an opportunity to get Stan Lee's autograph because he has to make an appearance in traffic court.

Episodes.Title: The Precious Fragmentation
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steven Molaro
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: The guys' friendship is threatened when they find a ring from the "Lord of the Rings" trilogy.

Episodes.Title: The Pants Alternative
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Eric Kaplan
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon seeks help from the rest of the gang in overcoming his fear of public speaking when he receives an award.

Episodes.Title: The Wheaton Recurrence
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, David Goetsch
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon takes on Wil Wheaton in a game of bowling. Leonard and Penny's relationship comes to a crossroad.

Episodes.Title: The Spaghetti Catalyst
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Lee Aronsohn
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Sheldon is forced to go behind Leonard's back to spend time with Penny following their breakup.

Episodes.Title: The Plimpton Stimulation
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Steven Molaro
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Chaos ensues when a nymphomaniac physicist visiting Sheldon hooks up with Leonard.

Episodes.Title: The Staircase Implementation
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, David Goetsch
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Leonard tells Penny about how he and Sheldon became roommates and what happened to the elevator.

Episodes.Title: The Lunar Excitation
Episodes.Writer: Chuck Lorre, Bill Prady, Lee Aronsohn
Episodes.Actors: Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons, Kaley Cuoco
Episodes.Plot: Penny has a night of angry, drunken sex with Leonard, much to his confusion. Meanwhile, Howard and Raj search for Sheldon's perfect match online.
